decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through a combination of low-cost burn spells and aggressive creatures. The commanders, Krark and Jeska, provide additional ways to burn the opponent and control the board. The deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. With a mix of direct damage spells, efficient creatures, and powerful commander abilities, this deck excels at being relentless in its pursuit of victory. The key strategy is to maintain a fast pace and overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of burn spells and creature attacks, keeping them on the back foot and unable to recover.

This deck focuses on utilizing Winota, Joiner of Forces to quickly create a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. It includes a mix of low-cost creatures with enter the battlefield abilities and ways to protect them, such as Selfless Spirit and Giver of Runes. The deck also has ways to generate additional value through cards like Goblin Bombardment and Skyclave Apparition. By maximizing the number of non-humans in the deck, Winota's ability to put creatures onto the battlefield can be consistently triggered, allowing for explosive turns and putting pressure on the opponent to deal with a fast and resilient board state.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive strategies to quickly overwhelm the opponent in a 1 vs 1 duel. With Jeska and Esior as commanders, the deck aims to deal damage efficiently and explosively. By including a mix of powerful instants, sorceries, and creatures, the deck can apply pressure early in the game and maintain momentum throughout. Cards like Lightning Bolt, True-Name Nemesis, and Brazen Borrower provide efficient removal and threats to control the board. The deck also includes various counterspells like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect the board and disrupt the opponent's plans. Overall, the deck aims to quickly establish dominance and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with Grenzo, Dungeon Warden as the commander. It includes a variety of goblins and efficient removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building a strong board presence. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly with hasty creatures and tribal synergies, utilizing cards like Goblin Chieftain, Goblin Warchief, and Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin to generate massive creature armies. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive creatures like Goblin Chainwhirler and Gempalm Incinerator to control the battlefield. With a mix of Goblin tribal support, removal, and card advantage, this deck seeks to apply early pressure and maintain a strong board presence to secure a victory.

This deck revolves around utilizing the powerful card advantage provided by Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw cards and generate value from a wide array of multicolored spells. The deck includes a diverse range of removal spells, creature threats, and mana ramp to control the board while also presenting a potent win condition in Niv-Mizzet Reborn. By effectively managing resources and making strategic use of the various multicolored spells in the deck, the player aims to outvalue and outmaneuver their opponent, ultimately establishing dominance on the battlefield and securing victory through a combination of card advantage and powerful multicolored creatures and spells.

The deck revolves around utilizing the commander, Sisay, Weatherlight Captain, to efficiently search for and play a wide variety of powerful control cards. This control archetype aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using a mixture of removal spells, counterspells, and hand disruption tools. The deck includes a range of versatile and flexible cards that can handle various threats and situations, allowing the player to adapt to different board states and strategies. By effectively managing resources and making strategic decisions, the deck can dictate the pace of the game and outmaneuver opponents. Additionally, the deck features a diverse mana base to support the casting of spells across different colors.

The main concept of this deck is to heavily control the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan while leveraging Leovold, Emissary of Trest's ability to draw cards every time the opponent tries to draw more than one card each turn. The deck includes a mix of counterspells, removal, and hand disruption to keep the opponent on the back foot. The deck also includes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi's Puzzle Box to further hinder the opponent's card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent by denying them resources and overwhelming them with a combination of card advantage and efficient threats.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures and disruptive spells to control the game. Jenara, Asura of War serves as a powerful aggro commander, able to quickly close out games. The deck includes a variety of creatures with unique abilities such as Giver of Runes, Knight of Autumn, and True-Name Nemesis to protect and support its strategy. Additionally, powerful control spells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Swords to Plowshares help disrupt opponents' plans and ensure the deck can maintain its pressure. The mana base is designed to consistently provide the necessary colors and resources to support the aggressive game plan.
